posts.message: Ransomware is now developed using JavaScript for cross-platform, TOR and bitcoin for anonymity, and they you can even use a PaaS to manage your hostages.
posts.caption: bleepingcomputer.com
posts.description: A new ransomware called Ransom32 has been discovered that is created entirely out of Javascript, HTML, and CSS. This ransomware is part of a new Ransomware as a Service that allows anyone with a bitcoin address to create their own ransomware and distributed as they see fit.

posts.message:
Last June, we had an idea to share the knowledge we gained during internships throughout our university study between us - my class of computer science senior students - to prepare each other for industry ( https://www.facebook.com/MuhammadBassem1/posts/10205425542092454 ).
Last semester we prepared a kind of curriculum and started those sessions and decided to have a weekly session. We had four sessions so far and will continue next semester isA. I thought that it may be a good idea to share the slides we have so far with you as it may be helpful to some.

- Bash : http://mbassem.com/talks/seniors-session-1-bash/
---------------------------
- How the Web Works By Saher El-Neklawy : https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1BFtegmPaPvfWBUra5YvdNc4MbffURNl3Bkrn7zAuPxs/edit#slide=id.gd9eeef4fb_0_103
----------------------------
- Deployment and Administration : http://mbassem.com/talks/seniors-session-3-deployments-and-administration/
----------------------------
- The Hitchhiker’s Guide to Working Abroad By Islam Al-Aarag : http://www.slideshare.net/MuhammadBassem1/the-hitchhikers-guide-to-working-abroad-by-islam-alaarag

If you have any questions/inquiries, feel free to ask. Also, your feedback and suggestions are welcome for sure.

الأصحاب القدام مش هأقدر أكون معاكم ونعيد الـ MDC على أصوله والـ Arab Team 2000 و الكشري وغيره، لكن إسلام هيبقى هناك فلو شفتوه ابقوا سلموا لي عليه :)
 Enjoy

posts.description: Doctors at Nicklaus Children's Hospital used Google Cardboard to save a 4-month-old girl's life.

posts.message:
السلام عليكم 
شباب حد يعرف الsmart pen  اللي معظم الانستراكتورز بيستخدموه في الشرح بحيث انهم يكتبو بيه على حاجه زي قطعة ازاز كدا و يظهر كتابتهم على اللاب او البروجيكتور؟ 
لو حد يعرفه اجيبه منين في مصر و ايه انواعه ؟

posts.description: A new JavaScript-based ransomware spotted in the wild uses Node.js to infect victims, meaning Windows, Linux and Mac users could be affected; Ransom32 is being sold on dark web as ransomware-as-a-service.

posts.message:
rails geeks, :)

in a multi-lingual website, assets pipe-lining needs every css file to be precompiled, while we have at least 1 file to be conditionally added (ie: style-rtl.css) if locale == "ar"

I am looking for the "rials way" to get over it, all I could find is some suggestions for workarounds 

your advice is deeply appreciated

السلام عليكم

من فضلكم  انا شغال .NET MVC 

لو عاوز اعمل موقع يشتغل زى Google Drive - بمعنى انه حيتم تخزين ملفات عليه فقط لا غير وكل يوزر حيكون له ملفاته الخاصة بيه وكمان ممكن يخلى حد تانى من المستخدمين يشوف او يحمل الملفات الخاصة بيه او بعضها ؟

أنا بجد استفدت من الأدوات دي..
